Promotion

#jestemzAGH neck gaiter

A black neck gaiter. Multifunctional piece of clothing that can be worn throughout the year. Perfect for outdoor activities in autumn and winter. The details that make it unique include the #jestemzAGH inscription and a sateen tag with the Wiedza Pasja Więź motto. Made in Poland. Opis produktu size: one size model: unisex colour: black type of print: sublimation print colour: white fabric: 90% polyester, 10% elastane weight: 130 g

+

25,00 PLN

33,00 PLN

Promotion

#jestemzAGH T-shirt

A classic black, cotton, unisex T-shirt with short sleeves. The details that make it unique include inscriptions on the front and back of the T-shirt (#jestemzAGH ) and a sateen tag with the Wiedza Pasja Więź motto. Made of high-quality material. Made in Poland. Both models wear size S. Unisex style – women should consider selecting a smaller size to avoid the oversize effect. Opis produktu size: (XS to XXL) model: unisex colour: black type of print: screen printing print colour: white fabric: 9

Promotion

AGH Shoelaces

A pair of white shoelaces with black “AGH” print, made from water- and abrasion-resistant material. Easy to tie, they are ideal for walks and runs. Product description: colour: white with black print length: 120 cm print type : screen printing material: nylon

+

7,50 PLN

10,00 PLN

New Product

Biała koszulka z grafiką budynku

Biała bawełniana koszulka z krótkim rękawem, w klasycznej linii, z grafiką z budynkiem AGH. Wykonana z wysokogatunkowego materiału. Produkcja polska. Fason unisex. Tasiemka napotnika w kolorach uczelni. Opis produktu rozmiar: od XS do XXL model: T-shirt kolor: czarny metoda nadruku: sitodruk kolor nadruku: kolorowy materiał: 92% bawełna i 8% elastan gramatura: 180 g

+

89,00 PLN

New Product

Białe sportowe skarpetki

Proste białe skarpetki z czarno-czerwonym napisem I love AGH. Na linii palców trzy paski w kolorach flagi AGH. Zapewniają wygodę podczas zajęć sportowych i rekreacyjnych. Wyprodukowane z najwyższej jakości bawełnianej dzianiny, gwarantują komfort i trwałość. Do rozpakowania kompletu skarpetek zalecamy użycie nożyczek. Rozerwanie zszytego kompletu może spowodować trwałe uszkodzenie towaru. Opis produktu kolor: biały materiał: bawełna 79%, poliamid 18%, elastan 3%

+

39,00 PLN

Black T-shirt 100 years of AGH UST

Black, cotton T-shirt, classic design, with logo for 100 years of AGH UST. Details such as satin label with jubilee logo, sweatband ribbon in university colours, and printed design on the back make it unique. Made of high quality fabric. Made in Poland. Available in men’s and women’s styles. Product description size: women’s, fitted waist (from S to XL), men’s (from S to XXL) type: T-shirt colour: black type of print: silk-screen printing colour of print: white fabric: 92% cotton, 8% elastane ba

Promotion

Bomber jacket

Transitional bomber jacket with the AGH letters embroidered thereon. The neck, sleeves, and bottom part of the jacket are ribbed. Press stud fastening alongside the entire jacket, side pockets. Available in two colour versions: black and pewter and navy-blue and grey. The jacket is a unisex style – our female clients are advised to choose a size smaller than usual if they want to avoid the oversize effect. Opis produktu size: XS to XXL (unisex) model: press-stud jacket colour: black and pewter a

New Product

Czarna czapka z daszkiem

Bawełniana czapka z daszkiem w kolorze czarnym z wyszytymi literami AGH. Uszyta w całości w Polsce z grubej bawełny. Z tyłu pasek z klamrą do regulacji obwodu. Obwód czapki - w zależności od regulacji – około 57-62 cm. Opis produktu kolor: czarny obwód czapki (w zależności od regulacji): 57-62 cm metoda zdobienia: haft materiał: 100% bawełna gramatura materiału: 240 g

Dark grey cotton winter hat

Soft, dark grey, cotton winter hat. On the rolled-up edge, a small cognac leather badge with engraved letters AGH. Product description size: universal type: beanie colour: dark grey fabric: 100% cotton (terry fleece) type of print on badge: engraving

Grey T-shirt 100 years of AGH UST

Grey, short sleeve, cotton T-shirt, modern design, with logo for 100 years of AGH UST. Sleeves rolled up twice, back of T-shirt sewn vertically, on the back (inside) there is a sew-on badge with words “100 LAT AGH”. Details such as satin label with jubilee logo, sweatband ribbon in university colours, and printed design on the front make it unique. Made of high quality fabric. Made in Poland.
